reviews.review: 锻炼智力
Me parece muy bueno, siendo sinceros me atasque en los tres ultimas camaras de prueba

This game is incredible. 9 years old and still feels innovative. The graphics are great. A few glitches here and there, but they're nothing serious. 3 hours is short for a campaign but there's more maps to play on at least. Keeping the game alive and fun.
Portal is a classic and still holds up. Only complaint is some bugs. 9/10
머리 좀 써야 깨는데 글라도스는 잣밥 입니다 글라도스 까지 가는 과정이 좀 빡치긴 합니다.
Атмосферная игра, где нужно шевелить мозгами:) Игра интереснаЯ! Пойду во вторую часть играть
一直听闻是一部神作 ，通关后发现果真如此，高台跳什么的真是刺激，机枪炮塔的声音也是萌萌哒。顺便说一句，片尾曲still alive真的好听啊，不得不说v社自家产的游戏就是让人放心。还在等什么？快去买吧！！！

es un buen juego, pone a prueva tu "inteligencia" porque tienes que pensar como resolver las pruevas que te ponen, aunque es muy corto te lo acabas en menos de 5 hrs y los niveles no estan tan bien planteados, son demaciado faciles, y el boss mas de lo mismo pero es entretenido, aparte que tiene un humor bastante agradable

puedes comprarlo si quieres pasar entretenimiento en unas horas, pero es mucho mejor el 2
Im still mad about my companion cube.
A carreira do jogo é muito legal, pena que é muito rápida, em 2h o jogo foi zerado, baixando o 2 para continuar a história
Muy corto, 2 horas me duró, despues tiene modos mas complicados pero sobre los mismos mapas

Take a gaming engine with strong physics modelling, exploit that strength as far as you can, then add a dose of cynical humour.  The result - Portal.  One of the cleverest puzzle game concepts ever - if lateral thinking is your thing, of course.  This game is shorter than many would like, but there's a much longer sequel once your appetitte is whetted.

I loved the game, the end does get emotional but that makes it that much better. Plus the end credits are the only credits to a game I watch all the way through with out going on someone else till it ends. All in all an amazing game.
Short, but sweet...as a cake. Even though the cake is a lie.
Richtig COOL! !

Great game,
 
a bit easy tho, toke me few hours to finish

a must play game

Listen to the credit music after finishing the game if you havent play the game.
Jako fabula to może być ale dwóch rzeczy mi brakuje, Współpracy i więcej poziomów fajnie by się grało z znajomymi! gra jest bardzo dobra! [9/10]
긴 말 필요 없음;

At this point it's hard to find a "gamer" who hasn't heard about portal. A great first person puzzle game overall. The only downside is that I finished it in less than 3 hours. But I guess there's a sequel so there's that.
Har velat spela Portal under en längre tid och nu när det är gjort förstår jag varför det är så omtyckt. Gött lir där man får tänka i i flera steg.
A masterpiece !!

Still one of the best games on the planet!
Bastante corto,pero muy entretenido y rejugable
Um jogo excelente para quem gosta de usar a memoria, o game mistura ação e raciocinio MUITO BOM!

Phenomenal.

It is really short (although there are bonus maps, which I haven't tried yet), but DANG is it a blast while it lasts. It's a great puzzle game, the story is awesome (full of twists), and it kept me interested throughout my entire playthrough.

RIP companion cube :(

9.5/10
Best 5 and a half hours ever spent, I got it in the valve complete pack for 20 euro. Well worth it. Time to download Portal 2.

一代经典作品，之前盗版通关了现在补个正版再通关一次。
传送门枪的设定超棒，由此而弄的各种谜题也超好玩。主线剧情难度一般，多想想通关问题应该都不大，高级房间和挑战部分关卡有点难，可以说适合各类人群（？）。
不说了，我去打2去了。
En moins de deux heures j'en ai eu pour mon argent !
Отличная игра, в свое время это было нечто)

Great game. 
definitly worth it's price lenght-wise.
puzzle variety, grinding difficulty ect.
valve quality +++

很有创意的一款游戏，值得一玩！
เพลิดีเเต่หลอนไปหน่อย

3.0小时通关，本天才还真是强啊23333
算是我steam里面第一通关的游戏吧，为V社的创意点个赞。

主线的流程就是在一个房间里面解谜，之后到下一个房间解下一个谜。
流程虽然很简单，但其实传送门有着完整的剧情和世界观。但想要了解事情的全貌，需要玩家自己从游戏的种种细节中自行推测。
在玩的过程中就像是盲人摸象一般的刺激233333
我个人还是很喜欢这种风格的。庞大世界观中的简单故事，但是你的周围全都是其他故事的碎片，你永远不可能了解全貌，但是自行脑补出的故事总是那么引人入胜。如果你看不到，那也许是你缘分未到。
[spoiler]就像人生。[/spoiler]

游戏的玩法很有新意，用一把传送枪和反重力鞋干翻一切。关卡设计巧妙，各种neta也会让人会心一笑。在你不停地前进的同时你也会研究出各种各样传送枪的用法，让人乐在其中。
虽然是老引擎了但是表现在现在看来也是不错。如果你初入steam不知道该选择什么游戏开始你的喜+1旅程的话，传送门是你不会错的选择。

[spoiler]什么时候V社才会学会数3呢？[/spoiler]
两小时通关= =动量守恒帅的不行，就是连续穿梭镜头晃到有点晕；机器人的声音很好听，boss唱歌也很欢乐

awesome game. Amazing futuristic concept and plausible ideas as well. Valve surpassed themselves here. Not very difficult once you get the hang of it, though addmiteddly I had to check yt vids for 3/4 levels towards the end, but thouroughly enjoyable. I was lucky enough to grab it on sale.. but if you cant or dont want to wait that long... THE PRICE IS TOTALLY WORTH IT!
激烈而古怪的电子音乐在本作占了主导当然也穿插了不少的古典音乐作为小插曲，再加上那丰富的各具特色的人物配音可以说当你完完整整的体验玩这个游戏之后一定会有那么一个小调或者一小段BGM又或者一段人物配音会让你难以忘怀。

如果是打折进来看的，请等起码80off再买，如果一已经到了，那你tm还在等什么，sbeam玩家怎么能没有这款游戏。
如果头晕记得玩两个小时以下是可以退款的

Mental damage acquired.

Simplemente Maravilloso!! un excelente juego que desafia tus habilidades estrategicas y si te gustan los juegos de pensar y resolver puzzles este es el tuyo, gran historia detras.... lo impresionante de este juego que siendo tan sencillo puede mantenerte enganchado hasta que lo termines, completando todos sus puzzles y ver el final epico que no te lo esperas y entendiendo todo alfinal del porque? y su creacion! lo recomiendo mucho! :D
Juegazo, engancha a más no poder. Me lo he pasado del tirón porque no podía parar. Sencillamente impresionante. Más que recomendado.

Gra sama w sobie bardzo wciąga. Rozwija logiczne myślenie. Będą pojawiać się chwilę kiedy trzeba będzie mocniej pogłówkować, ale czy to nie lepiej?
Bardzo spodobało mi się zakończenie, którego oczywiście nie zdradzę. Satysfakcjonujące.
Jest dość krótka, ale można także przechodzić poziomy społeczności.

 Warto wydać na nią te 9.99€

Если не тупить, можно пройти за полтора часа и успеть вернуть кровный полтос. Звук в игре советую выключить, так как решать головоломки он не помогает, а вот постоянно нудящая фоном гугл-баба только раздражает и отвлекает. Удачи!

Jogo sensacional, simples, intuitivo e tem o tamanho ideal para não ficar cansativo.
Pena que deixa muita coisa em aberto na história ou o que acontece em torno do game.

Portal is a short but fun puzzle solving game, something new and different, and is made by the producers of Half-Life, which I have not yet played but will soon. It combines puzzle solving with a mysterious setting, somewhere underground in the US, and features only two characters. This game took me only 3.5 hours, so it is quite short, but is still worth it. But the sequel is much better.
7/10.

Antes deu jogar Portal, ele já era bastante conhecido e eu ouvia todos dizerem que era um excelente jogo. Eu não sabia muito sobre ele, apenas sobre o próprio sistema de Portais, que já era bem interessante, e então quando eu fiz a conta no Steam, vi ele em promoção e resolvi comprar.

Mas quando comecei a jogar, que passei por um portal pela primeira vez, foi algo como "Wow. WOOOOOOOW", foi muito bugante kkkkk
Com o tempo fui me acostumando, ao longo que o jogo lentamente apresentava novos elementos e mecânicas de utilizar os portais através dos puzzles. Eu olho para as primeiras fases hoje e acho fáceis, mas no início o conceito de portais é um tanto complicado, e o game o apresenta de maneira fluida e gradativa. É incrível aprender sobre os portais e as forma de utilizá-lo, fazendo você querer jogar cada vez mais. Este é um exemplo de puzzle game bem construído.

Contamos com a presença de GLaDOS, uma sarcástica AI que nos orienta durante o percurso. Ela foi uma grande (e boa) surpresa pra mim, pois não fazia ideia de que seria uma personagem tão presente e cativante no jogo. No começo ela parece uma AI normal, mas você vai percebendo que ela fala de coisas perigosas de uma maneira bem psicopata kkkkk
Tem essas sacadas de humor muito legais, e você com certeza vai se divertir com a GLaDOS.

Portal é um pouco curto, dando pra zerar em alguns dias, mas ele ainda conta com alguns bônus e desafios (e bote desafio). Os gráficos são bem leves e a trilha sonora no começo pode não parecer muito presente, mas nos momentos certos consegue ser bem intensa.

Enfim, Portal é um jogo clássico que todo gamer deve jogar e que certamente vai lhe conquistar.

Still Alive <3
The cake is a lie 10/10
Tones of fun, funny villan, worth playing before playing portal 2.
The cake is a lie!!!
Portal is second in 3D puzzle games only to its successor, Portal 2. Don't mind me falling for half an hour, I'm just trying to get an achievement. For science.

Эту игру я купил только на распродаже вчера (28.11.16г) вместе с Portal 2. Думал, надоест сразу же, так как, я не любитель головоломок, не люблю я думать в играх, я играю в них ради удовольствия, чтобы насладиться сюжетом и геймплеем. А наоборот, очень меня затянула, я не мог оторваться, там такой геймплей интересный. А графика - просто космос, для тех годов, конечно же. Очень приятная и симпатичная, ещё нету мыльца, в отличии от новой Call of Duty. И саундтреки зашибенные, просто вписываются в атмосферу данной игры. Только есть один недочёт, она уж больно короткая, я её всего за 5.3 часов прошёл. Но ничего, сейчас пойду качать миленький Portal 2, и на ней ещё отыграюсь. Надеюсь, она будет ещё лучше, чем первая. Пройду 2 часть, напишу обзор и к ней. В ообщем, я ставлю этой игре 8,9/10. Поставил бы твёрдую десятку, если бы не продолжительность. Всем удачи и добра! ^_^
Great game, really recommend it. It has great humor and is fun, even though it's only a couple of hours long.
반시간 정도 했는데, 슬슬 재미있어지는 중.
